id.description: The unique identifier for the interview

application_id.description: The unique identifier for the job application associated with the interview

external_event_id.description: The identifier for the external event related to the interview

date_time.description: The start date and time of the interview
The end date and time of the interview

location.description: The physical or virtual location of the interview

video_conferencing_url.description: The URL for the video conferencing platform used for the interview

status.description: The status of the interview (e.g., scheduled, completed)

created_at.description: The date and time when the interview was created

updated_at.description: The date and time when the interview was last updated

interview.description: Details about the interview such as type or purpose

id.description: The unique identifier for the interview

name.description: The name or title of the interview

organizer.description: Information about the individual organizing the interview

id.description: The unique identifier for the organizer

first_name.description: The first name of the organizer

last_name.description: The last name of the organizer

name.description: The full name of the organizer

employee_id.description: The employee identifier of the organizer

interviewers.description: Information about the individuals conducting the interview

id.description: The unique identifier for the interviewer

employee_id.description: The employee identifier of the interviewer

email.description: The email address of the interviewer

response_status.description: The response status of the interviewer (e.g., accepted, declined)

scorecard_id.description: The identifier of the scorecard associated with the interviewer's evaluation
